Hi again all, picking up from my previous thread. I just spent a couple 
of hours scanning and photographing the mei and tsuba, after which I 
took into photoshop and as carefully as possible, masked all the strokes 
I could see and then added some contrast to just those areas. I think 
the good Dr Stein's guess of Umetada may be correct. The top character 
definitely look like Ume and a couple of you already thought the bottom 
was tada. I would be interested in others thoughts.
cheers

Rich T

http://www.image-hosting.net/images/messageboard/retalt/Umetada-Tsuba.jpg

http://www.image-hosting.net/images/messageboard/retalt/Umetada-Tsuba-Mei.jpg
